data.text: Ade li, de guyei loo Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ!
Ade li, de lo gaazu, de mama,
Mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɠa ga GALAGI bɔɔlɔai,
Eteai ma yeɠe ɓomaʋɛ pɛ ka zoni zea,
Kpoloɗɛi ɠa ga nɔnɔ, tɔ ɠa é kpɛtɛa,
À ʋa, ade nɔkɔ bu, ade maayei tɔun bɛ,
à mina wo-ɠigiti kpa, eɠɛʋelei é ɠɛɛni la Meliɓa,95:8 Wɛlɛ ʋɛti: Ɛgz 17:1-7; GlS 20:2-13.
ʋɛ wo-mɛmɛwolani ti tɛ̀ɛni ga ná, ti sùɠɔɠɔ,
Kona ʋuunaanigɔ (40) laawu, niima yamanii wɔinzeɠeni mà,
Naa ɠa é kɛɛni, nà-ziiɠaawanai zu, gè ɠonani ga:
